name: Flamer (MrEliptik)
description:
You play as flamer, a kind of knight on fire. You must just, dash and use your fine skills to complete the levels... before it gets all dark!

Keyboard
  • Q : Left
  • D : Right
  • Space : Jump (double jump)
  • Shift : Dash
  • Ctrl : Slow-mo
XBox controller
  • D-pad left or Left analog stick to the left : Left
  • D-pad right or Left analog stick to the right : Right
  • A : Jump (double jump)
  • X : Dash
  • B : Slow-mo
Inside the levels you'll find little consumable flames. By catching them you increase your "power ups" counter (flames around you). Those can be used to perform special move, such as double jump, dash, and slow-mo.
